display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Re(s) = 1/2 is not arbitrary.
It is the discreteness constant √2
expressed in the language of
information theory.

'The information content of
discreteness equals
the critical line.'

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: All non-trivial zeros of ζ(s)\nhave Re(s) = 1/2
